pkgmetadata.longdescription: Interpret Tree Ensembles // For tree ensembles such as random forests, regularized random forests and gradient boosted trees, this package provides functions for: extracting, measuring and pruning rules; selecting a compact rule set; summarizing rules into a learner; calculating frequent variable interactions; formatting rules in latex code. Reference: Interpreting tree ensembles with inTrees (Houtao Deng, 2019, doi:10.1007/s41060-018-0144-8).
